snippet: Brad Davis scored on a penalty kick in the 82nd minute to help the Houston Dynamo end a club-record five-game losing streak in a 2-2 tie with the visiting Red Bulls.
abstract: Houston Dynamo and New York Red Bulls play to 2-2 draw in Major League Soccer action.
lead_paragraph: Brad Davis scored on a penalty kick in the 82nd minute to help the Houston Dynamo end a club-record five-game losing streak in a 2-2 tie with the visiting Red Bulls.

headline.main: Red Bulls Settle for Tie in Houston
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Settle for Tie in Houston
